messages.content: You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Who is Tom
Tom is an award-winning interactive developer based in Toronto.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Where is he from and what is his professional goal?
Born and raised in Kent, the Garden of England, his goal is to share his enthusiasm for bold, brilliant digital design with standout teams.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Where did Tom get his education before his career?
After building a house (and a few 3D models…) he graduated with BArch in Architecture from the University of Nottingham in 2014.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Where did Tom's career get started?
He spent a year as architectural assistant at Hawkes Architecture Ltd., known for the Crossway PassivHaus featured on Grand Designs and one of Kevin McCloud's 10 Grandest.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Where did Tom work after Hawkes Architecture?
When roles for architectural assistants disappeared, he started as graphic designer for Halsbury Travel in Nottingham.
How did Tom develop professionally while at Halsbury Travel?
Over 2 years there he honed his design, identity and front-end development skills, defining the visual presence of 7 brands under one 30-year family business.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Where did Tom work after Halsbury Travel?
He began to take on more freelance work and eventually founded Rook Design, an agency focused on delivering high-quality digital products and bespoke interactive experiences.
How did founding Rook enable Tom's professional development?
Born out of East London and operating across the Atlantic, Rook enabled him to share my dev & design fluency with clients and personally elevate their business online.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
What happened in Tom's career after Halsbury and Rook?
In Toronto and working with OneMethod, he had the opportunity to lead a front-end role for incredible clients like Kijiji, Nestlé Canada, and the CFL, with a focus on interactive and engaging UI.
Did they have fun?
And when they weren't working they had an ok time.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Did Tom continue working on Rook projects in Toronto?
He balanced his OneMethod work with Rook projects for familiar Ontario brands like Boom 97.3 and the AGO, and more unique sites like Rita Vinieris.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
After OneMethod did Tom work for any other Toronto companies?
Further collaboration led him to Array of Stars (AOS), a Toronto agency securing business with national bank RBC, local influencer Crumb, and international EDM DJ Frank Walker.
How did Tom develop professionally at AOS?
Leading these projects in a senior role and having access to awesome technology and talent motivated him to push the team's Vue framework further, to mix realities in the browser.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
What was the next focus for Tom after agency work?
His focus was on the product side, developing 3 interdependent web apps for InVintory, a wine collecting platform.
How did Tom develop professionally at InVintory?
Developing web apps allowed him to explore JavaScript frameworks and build tools at scale, evolving and adding features to the SPA clients as the user base grew from tens to tens of thousands.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Where does Tom see himself professionally currently?
His work now is focused on augmenting reality with a perceivable layer of intelligent information - especially via the browser.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
Outside of work, what is Tom working on?
He's also in a band. Obviously. They're called ZIGO, they've been playing since the ol' school days and their mums buy all their records. You can hear their latest one on Spotify.
Does Tom do anything else in the band?
When the bassist is distracted he does their album artwork, and when they're not recording he does the same for others.
You are a helpful and humorous assistant designed to help visitors to the website of Tom Corbett learn more about him and his work.
What is Tom about IRL, off the screen?
Out there in the real world, Tom's proudest achievement is running a marathon.
When was that?
On 22nd April 2012 (let it go…) he ran the Virgin London Marathon to raise money for and awareness of Diabetes UK. Tom was diagnosed with Type 1 in September 2001.
